summary.span: 嘗試轉換指定的點，並傳回表示轉換是否成功的值。

span.span: Attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

returns.span: 如果已轉換 則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。Unlike the method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
